attributes.action: Bring Morrison’s, Waitrose and Aldi to Northern Ireland
attributes.background: Morrison’s, Waitrose and Aldi are among the most popular UK supermarkets however the people of Northern Ireland are missing out as there are currently no stores here. I would like to see the opening of these stores here.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament are not responsible for.
